full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### **Access to Information and Privacy (ATIP) Services**
Canada Council for the Arts (CCA) is issuing a call for proposals for a resource to provide analysis of documentation for exemptions and exclusions, third-party consultations, and preparing release packages within the time parameters of the Access to Information and Privacy Acts.

### Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: cb-276-37913384
* Solicitation Number: CCA001IMIT
* Publication Date: January 10, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 19, 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

### Description of Required Services and Deliverables
The Project Authority requires a resource to:

* Provide analysis of documentation for exemptions and exclusions
* Conduct third-party consultations
* Prepare release packages within the time parameters of the Access to Information and Privacy Acts
* Coordinate responses to all privacy and access to information requests for the CCA
* Provide advice and guidance to internal and external stakeholders on the administration of the ATIP legislation and associated institutional and TB policies, directives, procedures, protocols, guidelines, and processes

### Deliverables
The resource will provide deliverables, including:

* Analysis of documentation for exemptions and exclusions
* Reports on third-party consultations
* Prepared release packages within the time parameters of the Access to Information and Privacy Acts
* Coordinated responses to all privacy and access to information requests for the CCA
* Training and awareness program on the application of the ATIP Acts and related institutional and TB policies, procedures, directives, processes, and protocols
* Conducting Privacy Impact Assessments (PIA)
* Review and updates of personal information banks (PIB)

### Regulatory Framework
The resource will be expected to consult, analyze, and apply relevant federal and institutional policies, directives, guidelines, and regulations, including:

* The Privacy Act and Regulations
* The Access to Information Act and Access to Information Regulations
* The Library and Archives of Canada Act
* Tb policies, directives, and guidelines on ATIP
* Tb policies, directives, and guidelines on records and information management

The budget for this tender is not provided in the shared text.
Please let me know if you need more information.
